participant_2.background:
I miss the days of being a kid, but I'm trying to make the best of my current situation.
I love to cook and try new recipes, but I usually end up making campfire stew because it's my favorite.
I just got back from visiting my family
I have two loves: my family and travel.
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

content.text: It is going great! I just got back from visiting my family.
Nice! I miss the days of being a kid.
I do too, but I try to make the best of my current situation.
What do you do for fun?
I love to cook and try new recipes. I usually end up making campfire stew because it is my favorite.
That sounds yummy! I do not play sports because I'm too busy going to brunch with my family.
I love my family and travel. I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.
I think I am fabulous! What do you think of yourself?
I think I am pretty great too! I am just trying to figure out what I want to do with my life.
I am glad to hear that you are doing well. I am also trying to figure out what I want to do with my life. I recently finished my career and discovered that I am not that passionate about it.
That is tough. I am sure you will figure it out. I think you should pursue your creative work.
I will think about it. Thanks for the advice
